alert.note: Alert for Butler; Greenwood (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 28 at 4:27AM CDT by NWS Wichita
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northern Butler and western Greenwood Counties through 530 AM CDT... At 427 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 8 miles east of Potwin, or 8 miles north of El Dorado, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... El Dorado, Augusta, Eureka, Towanda, Leon, Potwin, Rosalia, Cassoday, Climax, Eureka City Lake, El Dorado State Park, Thrall, Eureka Airport, El Dorado Airport and El Dorado Lake. This includes Interstate 35 between Mile Markers 65 and 96. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
